/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, are adorned with colorful signs and advertisements, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a refreshing contrast to the concrete structures. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
